Parameters.Name: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 Features detection
Test.Name: GetServices and Digest suported
Test.Description: GetServices - supported. Digest - supported.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: one recording
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends correct response with one recording

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: one recording
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends correct response with one recording

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: No recordings
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends correct response with no recordings

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: several recordings
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends correct response with several recordings

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: No response on GetRecordings
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends no response on GetRecordings

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Fault on GetRecordings
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends fault on GetRecordings

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Fault on GetRecordingConfiguration response
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends fault message on GetRecordingConfiguration response

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Fault on SetRecordingConfiguration response
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends fault message on SetRecordingConfiguration response

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: No event with topic tns1:RecordingConfig/RecordingConfiguration
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends GetEventPropertiesResponse without topic tns1:RecordingConfig/RecordingConfiguration

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: Event is property
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when Event with topic tns1:RecordingConfig/RecordingConfiguration is property

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: Event without Source.SimpleItem
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when Event has no Source.SimpleItem

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: Event has Source.SimpleItem with wrong Name
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when Event has Source.SimpleItem with wrong Name

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: Event has Source.SimpleItem with wrong Type
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when Event has Source.SimpleItem with wrong Type

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: Event has no Data.ElementItem with Name="Configuration"
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when Event has no Data.ElementItem with Name="Configuration"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: Event has Data.ElementItem with wrong Type
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when Event has Data.ElementItem with wrong Type

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: Wrong Topic
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends Notification with wrong Topic

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: invalid UTC-Time
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends Notification with invalid UTC-Time

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: no Source.SimpleItem item with Name="RecordingJobToken"
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends Notification without Source.SimpleItem

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: message with not existing RecordingJobToken
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends Notification with invalid RecordingJobToken

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: DUT sends 2 messages
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends 2 messages

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: no Data.ElementItem item with Name="Configuration"
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends Notification without Data.ElementItem item with Name="Configuration"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: Data.ElementItem with Name="Configuration" use wrong scheme
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends notification where Data.ElementItem item with Name=«Configuration» use wrong scheme

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Data.ElementItem item with Name=«Configuration» differs from RecordingConfiguration
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when Data.ElementItem item with Name=«Configuration» from Notification message has different value with RecordingConfiguration element from GetRecordingConfigurationResponse messages for selected Recording

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: The DUT did not send PullMessagesResponse message
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT did not send PullMessagesResponse message

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: There is not expected event: no events
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends PMs responses with no events Check that TT will wait operation delay for catching of event Check for different Operation delay values (10 s, 30 s, 60 s)

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: There is not event: event for not tested Recording
Test.Description: Set Operation delay to 10 s Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends PullMessages response with not expected Recording token

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Other name in PM
Test.Description: Name in PM differ with name in SetRecordingConfiguration and GetRecordingConfiguration

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Duration value
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-3 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends MaximumRetentionTime=PT0M0S in PullMessages and MaximumRetentionTime=PT0S in GetRecordingConfiguration
